name: Gotta Catch 'Em All!
description:
Project made for trijam #128 (theme: Throw it to me). Game made in 5 hours instead of 3.

You have to catch all the balls nedeed before the timer end to increase your score. Good Luck and don't hesitate to put your high score in comment !

CONTROLS: Move with the arrow keys.

Credit:

PoisseCaillu: Art, Game Design.

Me: Code, Game Design & some Art.

Music: Ashe Kirk,  ShwiggityShwag.
